articles.author: Sonia Twigg
articles.title: England vs Australia LIVE: Cricket scorecard and Ashes Test updates from day four at Edgbaston
articles.description: The first Ashes Test looks set to go to the wire as England return to the middle on day four looking to build a challenging target for Australia to chase
articles.content:
England and Australia face off on a crucial day four of this first Ashes Test, which looks set to go to the wire at Edgbaston.
Australia fell seven runs short of Englands first innings total but the… [+5444 chars]

articles.content:

articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
